#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Pacific Rim
#Text=braces for tsunami following major Chilean earthquake
#Text=Saturday , February 27 , 2010
#Text=At 06:34 UTC
#Text=today , an 8.8 magnitude earthquake hit Chile , triggering a tsunami in the Pacific Ocean .
#Text=The tsunami has already hit the French Polynesia islands , with waves reaching two metres ( six feet ) high damaging to the coast .
#Text=In Fiji
#Text=Japanese officials expect waves 2.3 metres ( 7.5 feet high ) .
#Text=Australia and New Zealand are expected to receive waves of one metre ( three feet ) which are expected to hit within 24 hours of the earthquake .
#Text=The Pacific Tsunami Warning Center reported that there may be " widespread damage " from the waves , saying that " authorities should take appropriate action in response to this threat . "
#Text=In a special report , Wikinews looks at how different parts of the world have been affected by the disaster .
#Text=North American west coast and Hawaii
#Text=Hawaii is expecting to receive waves reaching 2.5 meters ( 8 feet ) high .
#Text=A warning went into effect at 6AM local time – 5 hours before the expected arrival of the Tsunami ; Hawaiian Governor Linda Lingle declared a state of emergency .
#Text=At present , there are confirmed reports from the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center of waves hitting the islands ' eastern coasts .
#Text=Get off the shoreline .
#Text=We are closing all the beaches and telling people to drive out of the area
#Text=— Hawaiian civil defence spokesman John Cummings
#Text=Additionally , the western coast of the United States – extending from California to portions of Alaska – is under a tsunami advisory .
#Text=The civil defence spokesman for the Hawaiian island of Oahu , John Cummings , encouraged people to " get off the shoreline .

#Text=In a statement , the New Zealand Ministry of Civil Defence and Emergency Management commented ,  [ the ] current assessment is for a non-destructive tsunami for New Zealand with wave heights at the shore of between 0.2 and one metre [ three feet ] .

#Text=The centre , which also confirmed the initial Chile earthquake , also added that  sea-level readings confirm that a tsunami has been generated which could cause widespread damage . "

#Text= We 've just had a report from a trader fishing boat out at the Hen and Chick islands , about 10 kilometres off the coast , and they have noticed quite a significant surge , " he remarked .

column1: #Text=New Zealand Civil Defence Minister John Carter also appealed for residents to heed officials ' warnings and stay away from shorelines throughout the day .
#Text=Australia
#Text=The east coast of Australia was placed under a tsunami alert ; the impact expected in Sydney from 8:45am local time , Sunday there , and along other parts of the New South Wales coast .
#Text=Areas in Tasmania potentially affected by the quake would be under tsunami alert until 7:45am local time .
#Text="
